explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the engineering geological characteristics and reinforcement technology of dangerous rock bands in mountainous areas. It discusses methods like classification investigation, evaluation, and physical reinforcement techniques (e.g., clearing risk, repairing, reinforcement, landscaping). There is no mention of any machine learning, deep learning, or related computational techniques in the title or abstract. The study is purely in the domain of geological engineering and does not involve any of the listed AI/ML keywords.
